sourcesContent:
import "./f.css" export default function F5() { return (

A simple way to make a good first impression - Smile

  • The expression one wears on his face is far more important than the clothes that one wears on his back
  • Action seems to follow feeling, but really action and feeling go together; and by regulating action which is under the more direct control of the will we can indirectly regulate the feeling which is not
  • Do not fear being misunderstood, and do not waste a minute thinking about your enemies
  • Try to fix in your mind what you would like to do, and then without veering off direction you will move straight to the goal.
  • Picture in your mind the able, earnest, useful person you desire to be, and thought you hold is hourly transforming you into that particular individualâ€¦ Thought is supreme
  • Preserve the right mental attitude, attitude of courage, frankness and good cheer. To think rightly is to create.
  • For someone who has seen a dozen people people frown, scowl or turn their faces away your smile is like the sun breaking through the clouds
  • Your smile is a messenger of your good will.
) }
